scenario_text.value: Oh, man, you really saved my bacon, Takuma...

This guy just showed up, so I freaked out and
booked it. Then that mini-golem showed up...

I tried to warn you about the Gottsumon, but
you ran from me instead!
C’mon man, I already said it was my bad!

Wow, Minoru’s already getting along so well
with him...

We became buds in no time, too! Right,
Takuma?
I wouldn’t call it “no time”...

...Okay, real talk, Takuma. What the heck are
these things?!

That’s what I want to know! They’re on our
side, though, that much is for sure.
Yeah, on your side!

You saw it for yourself, didn’t you? How they
protected us.
Well yeah, I sure did!

I believe I spoke to that several times
already...

All I know is that we’re being attacked by
these strange creatures in this weird forest.

We’re relieved to have you fighting on our
side.

Heck, I’m just relieved to find anyone else!
Come on, let’s look for Aoi and the others.
Yeah...
Hmm? Is something wrong, Minoru?
Uh... Well, it’s just...

I was with Aoi before, but then Falcomon
spooked me and I just...

I took off at full speed...and left Aoi
behind...

WHAT?!
You LEFT her behind?!
I just freaked out, man! I’m sorry!

This is bad. Which way is she? There must be
other monsters out there besides Gottsumon.
Not many, but I do sense a number of them.
We have to look for her, and now!

She isn’t around here, we should go look
somewhere else.
Yeah, let’s go!
...Taaakumaaa! Minoooruuu!
Oh! That voice!

(It’s coming closer, from the direction of
the shrine...could it be...?)
